casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Kevin Lyn BEVERLY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159736
COA: 346682 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 24, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to exceed the page limitation for his reply is GRANTED. The 17-page reply submitted on July 19, 2019, is accepted for filing.
